content:encoded:
This week we talk about Occupy Wall Street and other Occupations. Links mentioned in the show:

  • Occupy Minnesota

  • Ballad of a Thin Man

  • THe 1 Percent
  • Sidney Tarrow on OWS
  • SlutWalk
  • Dean Zimmerman
  • Elijah Anderson on Office Hours
  • Kieran Healy on Steve Jobs
  • Feminist Ryan Gosling
